rules_text:
Flying
When Centennial Referee enters, you may blank a non-colorless creature you control. When you do, create a 0/3 colorless Wall creature token. [i](It loses all colors and abilities.)[/i]
notes:
SMALL creature CMC 1 

DISTRIBUTE THESE KEYWORDS AMONGST WHITE COMMON CREATURES (Additional keywords fine): Flying, Flying, Vigilance. Lifelink
